footer.purpose-1: Our company, which has a customer satisfaction-oriented understanding; With its sales, accounting, purchasing and shipping staff, it continues to serve its dealers with great sensitivity, getting great customer support every day.
home.carousel.info-1: We carry out the design process, which is the first step of production, professionally, and lay the foundations firmly.
home.carousel.info-2: We produce the most innovative and quality products with our team of experts, each of whom is an expert in their field.
home.carousel.info-3: You can contact us for our EMC-EMI, microwave analysis & measurement and antenna measurement trainings.
home.services.text-1: We offer our products or services to you, our valued visitors and customers, with the online catalogue.
home.services.text-2: We provide consultancy services on many different subjects by our expert staff.
home.services.text-3: Every stock produced with an engineering perspective, technical infrastructure and experienced team is tested in our own laboratory.
home.corporate-text: Kuvayi Technologies manufactures high performance broadband RF and microwave antennas designed to maximize communication quality in voice, video and data communication environments. It specializes in the design and manufacture of communication accessories as well as antennas.
corporate.title: Corporate

products.antennas-item-text-2: Radiation in all directions in the horizontal plane
products.antennas-item-text-3: Radome suitable for indoor and outdoor environment
products.antennas-item-text-4: Dish, funnel and patch antenna structures
products.antennas-item-text-5: Directional radiation in the horizontal and vertical plane
products.antennas-item-text-6: For manned and unmanned aerial vehicles
